title: A look into the REM dreams of the animal kingdom
description: Animals' "active" sleep phases look very much like REM.

title: Apple details reasons to abandon CSAM-scanning tool, more controversy ensues
description: Safety groups remain concerned about child sexual abuse material scanning and user reporting.

title: BMW’s Neue Klasse points to a radical reinvention for future sedans
description: Innovations making it to production include a full-screen heads-up display and e-ink.
